text: Henry Benton Sayler (January 16, 1921 â€“ May 26, 2021) was an American politician. He was born in Savannah, Georgia. Sayler was in the Florida State Senate from 1967 to 1971 and 1973 to 1978, as a member of the Republican Party (20th district and 21st district). Sayler turned 100 in January 2021St. Pete WWII Hero Celebrates 100th Birthday and died four months later on May 26, 2021 in St. Petersburg, Florida.Henry Sayler obituary ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:Lawyers from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Politicians from Florida Category:People from Savannah, Georgia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Henry B. Sayler
